title: The MutleyMedia Booth
description: Provides a descriptive run-down of the machinations of the ACMI MutleyMedia Booth through a presentation taken from a walkthrough that will play on the Booth's three screens. Two short films - Pneumatic andChinagirl - embedded in the presentation represent the 16 original works by Australian artists made for screening insdie the Booth.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006002; Plasmatic compile: Multimedia Art Asia Pacific (MAAP) 2002, Beijing, China; Active
